title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\WeekDayOfMonth
name: WeekDayOfMonth
description:
Represents one week day in a month. An example is "the 4th Sunday".

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.WeekDayOfMonth

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.week_ordinal
params.description: Required. Week number in a month. 1-4 indicates the 1st to 4th week of the month. -1 indicates the last week of the month.

params.name: data.day_offset
params.description: Optional. Represents the number of days before or after the given week day of month that the patch deployment is scheduled for. For example if week_ordinal and day_of_week values point to the second day of the month and this day_offset value is set to 3, the patch deployment takes place three days after the second Tuesday of the month. If this value is negative, for example -5, the patches are deployed five days before before the second Tuesday of the month. Allowed values are in range [-30, 30].

methods.name: getWeekOrdinal
methods.description:
Required. Week number in a month. 1-4 indicates the 1st to 4th week of the month. -1 indicates the last week of the month.

Optional. Represents the number of days before or after the given week day of month that the patch deployment is scheduled for. For example if week_ordinal and day_of_week values point to the second day of the month and this day_offset value is set to 3, the patch deployment takes place three days after the second Tuesday of the month. If this value is negative, for example -5, the patches are deployed five days before before the second Tuesday of the month. Allowed values are in range [-30, 30].
